text: Friendly service. Teh halia was too sweet even though we requested it to be less sweet, overpowering the tea and ginger tastes.

I wish I could give zero star. Probably the worst experience. Kept asking if I want any drink. Die hard salesman, cannot take no for an answer and Mumbling to himself "everything also no".  I also noticed a lot of other shops doesn't have pricing here. He colleague also came and asked us again.

Date of visit: Mon 24 June 2024
Time : 9.45 pm

The Chinese desserts stall is closed on Mondays so we opted for cold drinks from Taj Mahal.
Ordered ice tea halia and ice chendol. Priced at $2.50 each.

The chendol drink is incredibly good.
My regular stall was closed and decided to give Taj Mahal a try. What a grave mistake. The drink was awful and the service was horrible.
Honeydew bubble does not look and tastes good stomachache right after
